text: Hey Twitter followers! 🚨👀 Join us on February 24th at 10am ET for a virtual discussion on the war in Ukraine, two years since Russia's invasion. 💥🇺🇦 We've got an expert panel featuring Dr. Seth G. Jones, Dr. Eliot A. Cohen, Emily Harding, and the Honorable Michael Vickers! 🤝🏻 They'll be discussing the state of the war, Ukrainian and Russian strategy, and the future of Western aid to Ukraine. Don't miss it! 🎙️👉
